name: Traveler Payhere
author: Dyno Labs

sections.description: Traveler Payhere Plugin allows you to accept payments seamlessly in your traveler wordpress theme using Payhere (Sri Lanka).
sections.installation:
1. You can install this plugin from the WordPress Plugin Directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
What is Traveler WordPress theme

Traveller WordPress Theme is Travel Booking WordPress Theme helps you Save Time, Save Money, Save Face, Save everything can Save to make online booking travel.
See https://travelerwp.com for more info.

What is Traveler Payhere plugin?

Traveler Payhere plugin allows you to accept payments in traveler wordpress theme using Payhere payment gateway.

How to create Payhere account?

You can create Payhere account by visiting https://payhere.lk
See https://support.payhere.lk/faq/general-questions for more info.
